decks.notes: The deck focuses on generating a large amount of mana quickly and efficiently with cards like Black Lotus and Moxen, as well as utilizing cards like Paradoxical Outcome to draw through the deck and find key combo pieces. The goal is to assemble the Time Vault and Voltaic Key combo to take extra turns and secure victory. The deck also includes disruptive elements like Force of Will and Flusterstorm to protect its combo and interact with the opponent. Overall, the deck aims to combo off and win the game in a fast and explosive manner.

This Azorius Initiative deck focuses on aggressive play, utilizing powerful cards like Narset, Parter of Veils, Force of Will, and Swords to Plowshares to maintain control over the game. With a mix of efficient creatures like White Plume Adventurer and disruptive spells like Daze, the deck looks to establish an early advantage and maintain pressure on the opponent. The inclusion of efficient mana sources like Moxen and fetch lands allows for explosive starts and smooth mana development, while cards like LÃ³rien Revealed and Seasoned Dungeoneer provide card advantage and selection to stay ahead in the game.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through countering spells, disrupting the opponent's strategy, and efficiently using graveyard recursion with cards like Gifts Ungiven, Brain Freeze, and Underworld Breach. It aims to out-value opponents with card advantage and powerful spells, while also having access to powerful mana acceleration with cards like Black Lotus and Mana Crypt. The deck utilizes a variety of counterspells and removal to disrupt the opponent's game plan and protect its own key cards, ultimately leading to a victory through incremental advantage and powerful plays.

This deck is focused on quickly milling and sacrificing cards to bring out Thassa's Oracle to win the game instantly. By using cards like Balustrade Spy and Boggart Trawler to mill the library, along with cards like Undercity Informer and Dread Return to bring back Thassa's Oracle, the deck aims to combo off as fast as possible. With a mix of free counter spells like Force of Will and Pact of Negation to protect the combo, along with additional disruption cards like Cabal Therapy and Fell the Profane, the deck is designed to win in a single explosive turn.
